list_ex_of_english: The women wear a collarless and sleeveless cloth to cover them from the shoulders to the knees.
By 1964, "discotheque" and the shorthand "disco" were used to describe a type of sleeveless dress used when going out to nightclubs.
A quilted sleeveless jacket was worn in cold weather.
The sleeve length is also variable, ranging from full-length or three-quarters to short-sleeved, cap sleeves or sleeveless.
The waistcoat could be sleeveless or have long sleeves.
In the early period of the game's development players often wore sleeveless lace-up tops which gradually disappeared between the 1960s and early 1980s.
Additionally, the sleeveless jerseys were abandoned for more traditional shirts.
Wearing shorts, sleeveless shirts or tanktops should be avoided.
